Cloudinary

# 

<span key="cee86821f6894cc8be85f6a9c2fb39ac"><span offset-key="cee86821f6894cc8be85f6a9c2fb39ac:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="aa3a716095e94367a46c1de16bacfadd"><span offset-key="aa3a716095e94367a46c1de16bacfadd:0">Cloudinary is a digital asset management platform with a broad feature set, including support for responsive image generation and url based image transformation. They also provide a powerful media library UI for managing assets, and tools for organizing your assets into a hierarchy.</span></span>

<span key="48515e4a504344d6bf797970b7d98377"><span offset-key="48515e4a504344d6bf797970b7d98377:0">The Cloudinary media library integration for Netlify CMS uses Cloudinary's own media library interface within Netlify CMS. To get started, you'll need a Cloudinary account and Netlify CMS 2.3.0 or greater.</span></span>

## 

<span key="4c358bcd4bfe45278432e2f5fb139836"><span offset-key="4c358bcd4bfe45278432e2f5fb139836:0">Creating a Cloudinary Account</span></span>

<span key="300f7ca5552441438d6deccf629d5675"><span offset-key="300f7ca5552441438d6deccf629d5675:0">You can </span></span><a href="https://cloudinary.com/users/register/free" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="08664387c0d4454e8db82dc206d73494" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="813748ddb9a2441280216ec665d0d1fd"><span data-offset-key="813748ddb9a2441280216ec665d0d1fd:0">sign up for Cloudinary</span></span></span></a><span key="def9421eacb14b69b204b141a8acb9bc"><span offset-key="def9421eacb14b69b204b141a8acb9bc:0"> for free. Once you're logged in, you'll need to retrieve your Cloud name and API key from the upper left corner of the Cloudinary console.</span></span>

<span key="8e80af2d1c474bb59d366da7c4128d12"><span offset-key="8e80af2d1c474bb59d366da7c4128d12:0">Cloudinary console screenshot</span></span>

## 

<span key="aeffc5739b0c458a8bd80345cdcb0390"><span offset-key="aeffc5739b0c458a8bd80345cdcb0390:0">Connecting Cloudinary to Netlify CMS</span></span>

<span key="75a70751fd154272b0538c3c9b9b7e1b"><span offset-key="75a70751fd154272b0538c3c9b9b7e1b:0">To use the Cloudinary media library within Netlify CMS, you'll need to update your Netlify CMS configuration file with the information from your Cloudinary account:</span></span>

1

<span key="4a3675f7c6014da8ad9bc44580dc84c5"><span offset-key="4a3675f7c6014da8ad9bc44580dc84c5:0">media\_library:</span></span>

2

<span key="21d162eefb3745f9880cf5eea0c5f69e"><span offset-key="21d162eefb3745f9880cf5eea0c5f69e:0"> name: cloudinary</span></span>

3

<span key="99d094d5a2d94b52982dc5b89d6c1f04"><span offset-key="99d094d5a2d94b52982dc5b89d6c1f04:0"> config:</span></span>

4

<span key="aa90af7acc2842ea9d5efddb89ebe353"><span offset-key="aa90af7acc2842ea9d5efddb89ebe353:0"> cloud\_name: your\_cloud\_name</span></span>

5

<span key="b882d848f2f84e95b741062fd563ab50"><span offset-key="b882d848f2f84e95b741062fd563ab50:0"> api\_key: your\_api\_key</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7" />

Copied!

<span key="e5d0a22e5e9e443b8d79b1b3915f93fc">**Note:**<span offset-key="e5d0a22e5e9e443b8d79b1b3915f93fc:1"> The user must be logged in to the Cloudinary account connected to the </span>`api_key`<span offset-key="e5d0a22e5e9e443b8d79b1b3915f93fc:3"> used in your Netlify CMS configuration.</span></span>

<span key="867cf2f79c6646a9bc00bbe39e6b8adf">**Note:**<span offset-key="867cf2f79c6646a9bc00bbe39e6b8adf:1"> The Netlify CMS media library extensions for Cloudinary are not included in </span>`netlify-cms-app`<span offset-key="867cf2f79c6646a9bc00bbe39e6b8adf:3">. If you're using </span>`netlify-cms-app`<span offset-key="867cf2f79c6646a9bc00bbe39e6b8adf:5">, you'll need to </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/blog/2019/07/netlify-cms-gatsby-plugin-4-0-0#using-media-libraries-with-netlify-cms-app" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="836f14c5ccd04b4b8c574aa76c2b6a71" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="60953881869949cbbedea825163d6faf"><span data-offset-key="60953881869949cbbedea825163d6faf:0">register the media libraries yourself</span></span></span></a><span key="93c4db9dac2c4eafb325afd2ddfc63ff"><span offset-key="93c4db9dac2c4eafb325afd2ddfc63ff:0">.</span></span>

### 

<span key="1f2edc01374947e2bf00ee4c3fc51b4a"><span offset-key="1f2edc01374947e2bf00ee4c3fc51b4a:0">Security Considerations</span></span>

<span key="f38c150e71e64205933a45869e3439b2"><span offset-key="f38c150e71e64205933a45869e3439b2:0">Although this setup exposes the </span>`cloud_name`<span offset-key="f38c150e71e64205933a45869e3439b2:2"> and </span>`api_key`<span offset-key="f38c150e71e64205933a45869e3439b2:4"> publicly via the </span>`/admin/config.yml`<span offset-key="f38c150e71e64205933a45869e3439b2:6"> endpoint, this information is not sensitive. Any integration of the Cloudinary media library requires this information to be exposed publicly. To use this library or use the restricted Cloudinary API endpoints, the user must have access to the Cloudinary account login details or the </span>`api_secret`<span offset-key="f38c150e71e64205933a45869e3439b2:8"> associated with the </span>`cloud_name`<span offset-key="f38c150e71e64205933a45869e3439b2:10"> and </span>`api_key`<span offset-key="f38c150e71e64205933a45869e3439b2:12">.</span></span>

## 

<span key="55d610792a7d441baceb9023e86b82e6"><span offset-key="55d610792a7d441baceb9023e86b82e6:0">Netlify CMS configuration options</span></span>

<span key="12417a9f5d2c4f9abd5f99454a597572"><span offset-key="12417a9f5d2c4f9abd5f99454a597572:0">The following options are specific to the Netlify CMS integration for Cloudinary:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="2a981d7ce99543bba4d117beb64c3c0e">**`output_filename_only`**<span offset-key="2a981d7ce99543bba4d117beb64c3c0e:1">: </span>*(default:* `false`*)*<span offset-key="2a981d7ce99543bba4d117beb64c3c0e:5"> By default, the value provided for a selected image is a complete URL for the asset on Cloudinary's CDN. Setting </span>`output_filename_only`<span offset-key="2a981d7ce99543bba4d117beb64c3c0e:7"> to </span>`true`<span offset-key="2a981d7ce99543bba4d117beb64c3c0e:9"> will instead produce just the filename (e.g. </span>`image.jpg`<span offset-key="2a981d7ce99543bba4d117beb64c3c0e:11">). This should be </span>`true`<span offset-key="2a981d7ce99543bba4d117beb64c3c0e:13"> if you will be directly embedding cloudinary transformation urls in page templates. Refer to </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/cloudinary/#inserting-cloudinary-url-in-page-templates" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e9332475294a4fd5acc36a4dd7aacef5" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="97bbac11d5064c759ea8516f172d5116"><span data-offset-key="97bbac11d5064c759ea8516f172d5116:0">Inserting Cloudinary URL in page templates</span></span></span></a><span key="3b213cd3b6f34877b83825bc602066a6"><span offset-key="3b213cd3b6f34877b83825bc602066a6:0">.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="183878f197cf4e82b131b868ec0cda7b">**`use_transformations`**<span offset-key="183878f197cf4e82b131b868ec0cda7b:1">: </span>*(default:* `true`*)*<span offset-key="183878f197cf4e82b131b868ec0cda7b:5"> If </span>`true`<span offset-key="183878f197cf4e82b131b868ec0cda7b:7">, uses derived url when available (the url will have image transformation segments included). Has no effect if </span>`output_filename_only`<span offset-key="183878f197cf4e82b131b868ec0cda7b:9"> is set to </span>`true`<span offset-key="183878f197cf4e82b131b868ec0cda7b:11">.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="29f0864194864767903832195d54fb52">**`use_secure_url`**<span offset-key="29f0864194864767903832195d54fb52:1">: </span>*(default:* `true`*)*<span offset-key="29f0864194864767903832195d54fb52:5"> Controls whether an </span>`http`<span offset-key="29f0864194864767903832195d54fb52:7"> or </span>`https`<span offset-key="29f0864194864767903832195d54fb52:9"> URL is provided. Has no effect if </span>`output_filename_only`<span offset-key="29f0864194864767903832195d54fb52:11"> is set to </span>`true`<span offset-key="29f0864194864767903832195d54fb52:13">.</span></span>

## 

<span key="ee62121e096e4cd1bac685ec58bda48f"><span offset-key="ee62121e096e4cd1bac685ec58bda48f:0">Cloudinary configuration options</span></span>

<span key="3a525aa6bffc484c92ffeba84e2749b0"><span offset-key="3a525aa6bffc484c92ffeba84e2749b0:0">The following options are used to configure the media library. All options are listed in Cloudinary's </span></span><a href="https://cloudinary.com/documentation/media_library_widget#3_set_the_configuration_options" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="89ac438df35c467cbb2036ec3a95e4f8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="7e55621758104e218988dac63923327f"><span data-offset-key="7e55621758104e218988dac63923327f:0">media library documentation</span></span></span></a><span key="26e6d2f34d2542d6ae6226c906660319"><span offset-key="26e6d2f34d2542d6ae6226c906660319:0">, but only options listed below are available or recommended for the Netlify CMS integration:</span></span>

### 

<span key="8b247e2eed214cfe82f53d6cf39560e2"><span offset-key="8b247e2eed214cfe82f53d6cf39560e2:0">Authentication</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="afc949d387894561b8ff8ca092e9d243">`cloud_name`</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="838054c4b42e43888301e3678890fe2a">`api_key`</span>

### 

<span key="ddba3190f1ca4012aa4597b5136abbf3"><span offset-key="ddba3190f1ca4012aa4597b5136abbf3:0">Media library behavior</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="4e6370d736d948748f69fd5e00870a02">`default_transformations`<span offset-key="4e6370d736d948748f69fd5e00870a02:1"> </span>*- only the first* </span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/cloudinary/#image-transformations" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b82577f42301437d83221cae7bf9c0f0" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="63d19d0ceca54db39e24055ff3200026"><em>image transformation</em></span></span></a><span key="0cf64a64b886416fb24c28c839a380a3"> *is used, be sure to use the* `SDK Parameter` *column transformation names from the*<span offset-key="0cf64a64b886416fb24c28c839a380a3:3"> </span></span><a href="https://cloudinary.com/documentation/image_transformation_reference" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="599f6811d60344ef9b64df71f91ffbc6" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="966e7613bd8a43368210299201a2f8ec"><em>transformation reference</em></span></span></a><span key="fa77218000b5487a82da734683399bf5"><span offset-key="fa77218000b5487a82da734683399bf5:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="9c84001d104840b6b29e7580d3d38338">`max_files`<span offset-key="9c84001d104840b6b29e7580d3d38338:1"> \_- has no impact on images inside the \_</span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/widgets/#markdown" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="df0aa631444447baabc9f844289f8c6c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="13e9e610756f4dc193cb4212a588f934"><em>markdown widget</em></span></span></a><span key="9659bf7267ed48c8b8b9def373d5f5b9"><span offset-key="9659bf7267ed48c8b8b9def373d5f5b9:0">. Refer to </span></span><a href="https://cloudinary.com/documentation/media_library_widget#3_set_the_configuration_options" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="67a6ea48069b41febee8c3c8609a3903" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="796eabb5153d4010ad4abf4e01495098"><span data-offset-key="796eabb5153d4010ad4abf4e01495098:0">media library documentation</span></span></span></a><span key="fb025e5cbdf14c8d9b00b6cfdf189037"><span offset-key="fb025e5cbdf14c8d9b00b6cfdf189037:0"> for details on this property</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="f9f5e2f6932d4247a416bdb36c34f096">`multiple`<span offset-key="f9f5e2f6932d4247a416bdb36c34f096:1"> \_- has no impact on images inside the \_</span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/widgets/#markdown" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ddf05ad3d06845d1be60b0130ddb2da6" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="eccf5afbc12342fdafda3c416e636b65"><em>markdown widget</em></span></span></a><span key="b9cb754e8cb041cfbc2e802fd0c0e1b8"><span offset-key="b9cb754e8cb041cfbc2e802fd0c0e1b8:0">. Refer to </span></span><a href="https://cloudinary.com/documentation/media_library_widget#3_set_the_configuration_options" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="89a6e8e5f4064d1687916372fde3de6e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="e9a10aad83224e23a60c3be505f48217"><span data-offset-key="e9a10aad83224e23a60c3be505f48217:0">media library documentation</span></span></span></a><span key="482ec6d09935421fafa1568109a9ac9e"><span offset-key="482ec6d09935421fafa1568109a9ac9e:0"> for details on this property</span></span>

## 

<span key="22ffc4f52a0b46509e8afc351a0f95bf"><span offset-key="22ffc4f52a0b46509e8afc351a0f95bf:0">Image transformations</span></span>

<span key="03998fcf6b6a4af7a906d6ceda906b44"><span offset-key="03998fcf6b6a4af7a906d6ceda906b44:0">The Cloudinary integration allows images to be transformed in two ways: directly within Netlify CMS via </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/cloudinary/#transforming-images-via-media-library" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ad6d28c126494fd9a8d042d2b9489f5d" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="9c61569abfd34396bb6b4bafa818294d"><span data-offset-key="9c61569abfd34396bb6b4bafa818294d:0">Cloudinary's Media Library</span></span></span></a><span key="2adf00a9992a4d88b468ed3c689cf97b"><span offset-key="2adf00a9992a4d88b468ed3c689cf97b:0">, and separately from the CMS via Cloudinary's </span></span><a href="https://cloudinary.com/documentation/image_transformations#delivering_media_assets_using_dynamic_urls" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7c23f576ff684b32b08c41b8bc36c053" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="bc0e159fbcf743b592f4f418e376e8e0"><span data-offset-key="bc0e159fbcf743b592f4f418e376e8e0:0">dynamic URL's</span></span></span></a><span key="d91ddf3ecea34e1a86ea3653d34924f7"><span offset-key="d91ddf3ecea34e1a86ea3653d34924f7:0"> by </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/cloudinary/#inserting-cloudinary-url-in-page-templates" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="da9ed78c8e604a97a9f12ad28db113b4" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="0d7200a224b041848677ae83d8d3eeb1"><span data-offset-key="0d7200a224b041848677ae83d8d3eeb1:0">inserting cloudinary urls</span></span></span></a><span key="7c11585e88784a129b18fac261d2929d"><span offset-key="7c11585e88784a129b18fac261d2929d:0">.</span></span>

### 

<span key="0ce3c68d66744c55985fee40388ccc51"><span offset-key="0ce3c68d66744c55985fee40388ccc51:0">Transforming images via Media Library</span></span>

<span key="b6207afbe39b4109b20d8643edd8c0cc"><span offset-key="b6207afbe39b4109b20d8643edd8c0cc:0">If you transform and insert images from within the Cloudinary media library, the transformed image URL will be output by default. This gives the editor complete freedom to make changes to the image output. There are two ways to configure image transformation via media library - </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/cloudinary/#global-configuration" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a564e39f40b7447cb19cf1544398e5f5" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="737c96e2795344d69b8191c6154bb194"><span data-offset-key="737c96e2795344d69b8191c6154bb194:0">globally</span></span></span></a><span key="b5b0b3e0c4054dc8bddefdf740198c0d"><span offset-key="b5b0b3e0c4054dc8bddefdf740198c0d:0"> and per </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/cloudinary/#field-configuration" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="92187f0067fc489181d42b236fc5a91a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="4c6912fe838145fd856c40d7d38a3c39"><span data-offset-key="4c6912fe838145fd856c40d7d38a3c39:0">field</span></span></span></a><span key="463ded4a6f3a4e7f9220d2d6cdcedd7c"><span offset-key="463ded4a6f3a4e7f9220d2d6cdcedd7c:0">. Global options will be overridden by field options.</span></span>

<span key="ad7c984150f8405790211f1e4a0ed796">**Global configuration**</span>

<span key="83b499326fa64db99acd046b9dc1bb6d"><span offset-key="83b499326fa64db99acd046b9dc1bb6d:0">Global configuration, which is meant to affect the Cloudinary widget at all times, can be provided as seen below, under the primary </span>`media_library`<span offset-key="83b499326fa64db99acd046b9dc1bb6d:2"> property. Settings applied here will affect every instance of the Cloudinary widget.</span></span>

1

<span key="43be0df387544d5e914b169feee324dc"><span offset-key="43be0df387544d5e914b169feee324dc:0"># global</span></span>

2

<span key="9b9a4bec7615458e98fbb748f4c6ef3d">**Field configuration**</span>

<span key="baa5ce6d586942ed96647aa1e9823b68"><span offset-key="baa5ce6d586942ed96647aa1e9823b68:0">Configuration can also be provided for individual fields that use the media library. The structure is very similar to the global configuration, except the settings are added to an individual </span>`field`<span offset-key="baa5ce6d586942ed96647aa1e9823b68:2">. For example:</span></span>

1

<span key="ec9dec787e3d479588d4cc1a37af2ee7"><span offset-key="ec9dec787e3d479588d4cc1a37af2ee7:0"># field</span></span>

2

<span key="d452dff369f248beab2e2ce457e4b671"><span offset-key="d452dff369f248beab2e2ce457e4b671:0">fields: # The fields each document in this collection have</span></span>

3

<span key="89023512757b4ce39d9093acd5e1eb12"><span offset-key="89023512757b4ce39d9093acd5e1eb12:0">- label: 'Cover Image'</span></span>

4

<span key="98c399688d394ab48638df4411d1013d"><span offset-key="98c399688d394ab48638df4411d1013d:0"> name: 'image'</span></span>

5

<span key="5d597661672346dba72e099f7fc0f79e"><span offset-key="5d597661672346dba72e099f7fc0f79e:0"> widget: 'image'</span></span>

6

<span key="220e6b467c814d548960f3b335fd3587"><span offset-key="220e6b467c814d548960f3b335fd3587:0"> required: false</span></span>

7

<span key="35b8165573e64c43af340dbe0c287aaa"><span offset-key="35b8165573e64c43af340dbe0c287aaa:0"> tagname: ''</span></span>

8

<span key="f9d0c473e2aa49f0aab0c028c85e887e"><span offset-key="f9d0c473e2aa49f0aab0c028c85e887e:0"> media\_library:</span></span>

9

<span key="6a166a8e3a7c4ddbb9210788437dbb85"><span offset-key="6a166a8e3a7c4ddbb9210788437dbb85:0"> config:</span></span>

10

<span key="9e4b2fffb44b413dbc1f03b5f2fbc193"><span offset-key="9e4b2fffb44b413dbc1f03b5f2fbc193:0"> default\_transformations:</span></span>

11

<span key="2c081ed1764e48f2a226c181f6b5a836"><span offset-key="2c081ed1764e48f2a226c181f6b5a836:0"> - fetch\_format: auto</span></span>

## 

<span key="e67782b3f9074a838f1a8ea707520440"><span offset-key="e67782b3f9074a838f1a8ea707520440:0">Inserting Cloudinary URL in page templates</span></span>

<span key="18fb247c9d55499a95ca09123522e389"><span offset-key="18fb247c9d55499a95ca09123522e389:0">If you prefer to provide direction so that images are transformed in a specific way, or dynamically retrieve images based on viewport size, you can do so by providing your own base Cloudinary URL and only storing the asset filenames in your content:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="3d6bc411563d42f9914b86b81c38c143"><span offset-key="3d6bc411563d42f9914b86b81c38c143:0">Either globally or for specific fields, configure the Cloudinary extension to only output the asset filename</span></span>

1

<span key="22fac93e97a945fba1df4aac71475435"><span offset-key="22fac93e97a945fba1df4aac71475435:0"># global</span></span>

2

<span key="2e4878537af34410915e631f276e7aa7"><span offset-key="2e4878537af34410915e631f276e7aa7:0">media\_library:</span></span>

3

<span key="21faafe35b90446f9ec84c8f5209be15"><span offset-key="21faafe35b90446f9ec84c8f5209be15:0"> name: cloudinary</span></span>

4

<span key="09467dba9341479d8c6bc286b31ee222"><span offset-key="09467dba9341479d8c6bc286b31ee222:0"> output\_filename\_only: true</span></span>

5

<span key="a62d7419f19043728b6d8c1b629b68bb"><span offset-key="a62d7419f19043728b6d8c1b629b68bb:0"># field</span></span>

6

<span key="43f23d32684b4dcdb5db055bf865b832"><span offset-key="43f23d32684b4dcdb5db055bf865b832:0">media\_library:</span></span>

7

<span key="129cd520cff04d35953ba67aa4e4752d"><span offset-key="129cd520cff04d35953ba67aa4e4752d:0"> name: cloudinary</span></span>

8

<span key="44067188e61944a587995e23cc15406f"><span offset-key="44067188e61944a587995e23cc15406f:0"> output\_filename\_only: true</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="52bbcf229e8f4bb58d26ff82989634bb"><span offset-key="52bbcf229e8f4bb58d26ff82989634bb:0">Provide a dynamic URL in the site template</span></span>

1

<span key="bee90029eaaa47138fe13809c746dfe2"><span offset-key="bee90029eaaa47138fe13809c746dfe2:0">{{! handlebars example }}</span></span>

2

<span key="136cfad12f3b4a9ea7258298bde04b51"><span offset-key="136cfad12f3b4a9ea7258298bde04b51:0">&lt;img src="https://res.cloudinary.com/&lt;cloud\_name>/&lt;resource\_type>/&lt;type>/&lt;transformations>/{{image}}"/></span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="d5b5b4e101b645a89555b41eee1123a4"><span offset-key="d5b5b4e101b645a89555b41eee1123a4:0">Your dynamic URL can be formed conditionally to provide any desired transformations - please see Cloudinary's </span></span><a href="https://cloudinary.com/documentation/image_transformation_reference" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7f3ff7bfd33548678e266cc8df82583d" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-1757_259-1758-237__"><span data-key="ef93625906464ff1974dc696d914bb19"><span data-offset-key="ef93625906464ff1974dc696d914bb19:0">image transformation reference</span></span></span></a><span key="4d0040281c4d46ea91fc239a90a688ac"><span offset-key="4d0040281c4d46ea91fc239a90a688ac:0"> for available transformations.</span></span>

Contents

<a href="cloudinary.html#undefined" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-855088 r-dwliz8 r-1loqt21 r-18u37iz r-lqms97 r-dnmrzs r-iphfwy r-1guathk r-1h8ys4a r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr r-7xmw5f"></a>

<a href="cloudinary.html#cloudinary-is-a-digital-asset-management-platform-with-a-broad-feature-set-including-support-for-res" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-855088 r-dwliz8 r-1loqt21 r-18u37iz r-lqms97 r-dnmrzs r-iphfwy r-1guathk r-1h8ys4a r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr r-7xmw5f"></a>

Cloudinary is a digital asset management platform with a broad feature set, including support for responsive image generation and url based image transformation. They also provide a powerful media library UI for managing assets, and tools for organizing your assets into a hierarchy.

<a href="cloudinary.html#creating-a-cloudinary-account" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-855088 r-dwliz8 r-1loqt21 r-18u37iz r-lqms97 r-dnmrzs r-iphfwy r-1guathk r-1h8ys4a r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr r-7xmw5f"></a>
